DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine if modern under-patient warming mattresses are as effective as forced air warming blankets in preventing cold and shivering in patients scheduled for non emergency surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of IPH: Electric Warming Mattress vs Forced Air Warming Blanket
DOC.criteria: All patients undergoing elective (non emergency) surgery who will require intraoperative warming Patients whose surgery will be performed with them in the supine position Abdominal aortic aneurysm repair All adults (over 18 years) who refuse,who are unable to fully understand the trial ALL laparoscopic surgeries
